Key.Original: Die Geldgrenze pro Vorgang liegt bei 999.999$

Key.French: Gestion de Gangs - Liste des Gangs Actuels

Key.Original: To create a gang it costs $%1
Key.English: To create a gang it costs $%1
Key.French: Pour créer un gang ça coute %1$

Key.Original: You aren't in a gang currently, what do you want to do?
Key.English: You aren't in a gang currently, what do you want to do?
Key.German: Du bist in keiner Gang, was möchtest du machen?
Key.French: Tu n'as pas de gang actuellement
Key.Italian: Non sei in una gang, cosa intendi fare?
Key.Portuguese: Você não está em uma Gangue, o que deseja fazer?

Key.German: Maximale Anzahl an Gang Mitgliedern erhöhen
Key.French: Augmentation du nombre de membre acceptés
Key.Italian: Aumenta numero massimo membri della Gang

Key.Original: You must create a gang first before capturing it!
Key.English: You must create a gang first before capturing it!
Key.German: Du musst erst in einer Gang sein, um einzunehmen zu können!
Key.French: Vous devez créer un gang avant de le capturer!
Key.Italian: Devi creare una gang prima di catturarla!
Key.Portuguese: Você precisa criar uma gangue antes de tentar capturar esse esconderijo!

Key.Original: Your gang already has control over this hideout!
Key.English: Your gang already has control over this hideout!
Key.German: Deine Gang hat bereits die Kontrolle über dieses Versteck!
Key.French: Votre bande a déjà le contrôle de cette cachette!
Key.Italian: La tua Gang ha già il controllo di questo Covo
Key.Portuguese: Sua gangue já tem controle sobre esse esconderijo!

Key.Original: Only one person shall capture at once!
Key.English: Only one person shall capture at once!
Key.German: Nur eine Person kann das Versteck einnehmen!
Key.French: Une seule personne doit capturer à la fois!
Key.Italian: Può conquistare solo una persona alla volta!

Key.Original:
This hideout is controlled by %1.

Are you sure you want to take over their gang area?
Key.English:
This hideout is controlled by %1.

Are you sure you want to take over their gang area?
Key.German:
Das Versteck wird durch %1 kontrolliert.

Bist du sicher, dass du ihr Gang Gebiet übernehmen möchtest?
Key.French:
Cette cachette est contrôlée par %1.

Etes-vous sûr que vous voulez prendre en charge leur zone de gang?
Key.Italian:
Questo Covo è controllato da %1.

Sicuro di voler prendere il controllo della loro area?
Key.Portuguese:
Esse esconderijo é controlado por %1.

Você tem certeza que deseja tomar essa área?

Key.French: La cachette est actuellement sous contrôle ...
Key.Italian: Il Covo è già sotto controllo...

Key.Original: %1 and his gang: %2 - have taken control of a local hideout!
Key.English: %1 and his gang: %2 - have taken control of a local hideout!
Key.German: %1 und seine Gang: 2% - haben die Kontrolle über ein lokales Versteck übernommen!
Key.French: %1 et sa gang: %2 ont pris le controle de la cachette !
Key.Italian: %1 e la sua Gang: % 2 - hanno preso il controllo di un Covo!
Key.Portuguese: %1 e sua gangue: %2 - agora tem o controle de um esconderijo!

Key.Original: You can't have a gang name longer then 32 characters.
Key.English: You can't have a gang name longer then 32 characters.
Key.German: Dein Gang Name kann nicht länger als 32 Zeichen sein.
Key.French: Vous ne pouvez pas avoir un nom de gang de plus de 32 caractères.
Key.Italian: %1 e la sua Gang: % 2 - hanno preso il controllo di un Covo!
Key.Portuguese: O nome de sua gangue não pode ter mais de 32 caracteres.

Key.Original: You have invalid characters in your gang name. It can only consist of Numbers and letters with an underscore
Key.English: You have invalid characters in your gang name. It can only consist of Numbers and letters with an underscore
Key.German: Du hast ein ungültiges Zeichen in deinem Gang Namen. Der Name darf nur aus Zahlen und Buchstaben sowie einem Unterstrich bestehen
Key.French: Vous avez des caractères non valides dans le nom de votre gang. Il ne peut être constitué de chiffres amd lettres avec un trait de soulignement
Key.Italian: Hai inserito caratteri non validi nel nome della Gang. Puoi inserire solo numeri e lettere con un underscore
Key.Portuguese: O nome da sua gangue tem caracteres inválidos. O nome so pode conter caracteres e números separados por sublinhado

Key.Original: You do not have enough money in your bank account.\n\nYou lack: $%1
Key.English: You do not have enough money in your bank account.\n\nYou lack: $%1
Key.German: Du hast nicht genug Geld auf deinem Bankkonto.\n\nDir fehlen: $%1
Key.French: Vous n'avez pas assez d'argent dans votre compte bancaire.\n\nVous manquez de: $%1
Key.Italian: Non hai abbastanza fondi nel tuo conto in banca.\n\nTi mancano: €%1
Key.Portuguese: Você não tem dinheiro suficiente na sua conta bancária.\n\nFaltam: R$%1

Key.Original: You have created the gang %1 for $%2
Key.English: You have created the gang %1 for $%2
Key.German: Du hast die Gang %1 für $%2 erstellt
Key.French: Vous avez créé la bande %1 pour $%2
Key.Italian: Hai creato la Gang %1 al costo di €%2
Key.Portuguese: Você criou a gangue %1 por R$%2

Key.Original:
You are about to disband the gang, by disbanding the gang it will be removed from the database and the group will be dropped.

Are you sure you want to disband the group? You will not be refunded the price for creating it.
Key.English:
You are about to disband the gang, by disbanding the gang it will be removed from the database and the group will be dropped.

Are you sure you want to disband the group? You will not be refunded the price for creating it.
Key.German:
Du bist dabei, die Gang aufzulösen. Durch Auflösung der Gang wird sie aus der Datenbank entfernt.

Bist du sicher, dass du die Gang auflösen willst? Du erhältst den Preis für die Erstellung nicht zurück.
Key.French:
Vous vous apprêtez à dissoudre le gang, en démantelant le gang, il sera supprimé de la base de données et le groupe sera supprimé.

Etes-vous sûr de vouloir dissoudre le groupe? Vous ne serez pas remboursé le prix de sa création
Key.Italian:
Stai per sciogliere la Gang, facendolo sarà rimossa dal Database e il gruppo verrà cancellato.

Sei sicuro di voler sciogliere il gruppo? Non verrai rimborsato dei fondi spesi per crearlo.
Key.Portuguese:
Você vai desfazer a sua gangue, ela será apagada do banco de dados.

Você tem certeza que quer desfazer a gangue? Você não será reembolsado.

Key.Original: The leader has disbanded the gang.
Key.German: Der Anführer hat die Gang aufgelöst.
Key.French: Le chef a démantelé le gang.
Key.Italian: Il Capo ha sciolto la Gang
Key.Portuguese: O lider da gangue desfez a gangue.

Key.Original:
%1 has invited you to a gang called %2
If you accept the invitation you will be a part of their gang and will have access to the gang funds and controlled gang hideouts.
Key.English:
%1 has invited you to a gang called %2
If you accept the invitation you will be a part of their gang and will have access to the gang funds and controlled gang hideouts.
Key.German:
%1 hat dich zu einer Gang namens %2 eingeladen
Wenn Du die Einladung annimmst, wirst du ein Teil der Gang und bekommst Zugang zu den Gang-Konten und kontrollierten Gang Verstecken.
Key.French:
%1 vous a invité à un gang appelé %2
Si vous acceptez l'invitation que vous serez une partie de leur gang et aurez accès à des fonds de gangs et des cachettes de gangs contrôlés.
Key.Italian:
%1 ti ha invitato nella Gang: %2
Se vuoi accettarai l'invito entrerai a far parte della loro Gang ed avrai accesso ai loro fondi e ai loro Covi.
Key.Portuguese:
%1 convidou você para a gangue %2
Se você aceitar você terá acesso aos recursos da gangue e os esconderijos.

Key.Original: You are about to invite %1 to your gang, if they accept the invite they will have access to the gang's funds.
Key.English: You are about to invite %1 to your gang, if they accept the invite they will have access to the gang's funds.
Key.German: Du bist dabei, %1 in deine Gang einzuladen. Wenn die Einladung angenommen wird, hat der Spieler Zugang zu den Mitteln der Gang.
Key.French: Vous êtes sur le point d'inviter %1 à votre gang, s'ils acceptent l'invitation, ils auront accès à des fonds du gang.
Key.Italian: Stai per invitare %1 nella tua Gang, se accetterà l'invito avrà accesso ai fondi della Gang.
Key.Portuguese: Você vai convidar %1 para a gangue, ele terá acesso aos recursos da gangue.

Key.Original: You need to select a person to invite!
Key.English: You need to select a person to invite!
Key.German: Du musst einen Spieler zum Einladen auswählen!
Key.French: Vous devez sélectionner une personne à inviter!
Key.Italian: Devi selezionare una persona da invitare!
Key.Portuguese: Você tem que selecionar um jogador para convidar!

Key.Original: You have sent a invite to your gang to %1
Key.English: You have sent a invite to your gang to %1
Key.German: Du hast eine Einladung in deine Gang an %1 gesendet
Key.French: Vous avez envoyé une invitation à votre gang à %1
Key.Italian: Hai mandato l'invito alla tua Gang a %1
Key.Portuguese: Você enviou um convite para %1 se juntar a sua gangue

Key.German: Du kannst dich nicht selbst kicken!
Key.French: Vous ne pouvez pas kicker vous-même!
Key.Portuguese: Você não pode kickar você mesmo!

Key.Original: Your gang has reached its maximum allowed slots, please upgrade your gangs slot limit.
Key.English: Your gang has reached its maximum allowed slots, please upgrade your gangs slot limit.
Key.German: Deine Gang hat die maximale Anzahl an Plätzen erreicht, bitte erhöhe das Limit deiner Gang.
Key.French: Votre gang à atteint le nombre de membre maximum, veuillez augmenter cette limite.
Key.Italian: la tua Gang ha raggiungo il numero massimo di posti consentiti, aumentane il limite.
Key.Portuguese: Sua gangue está lotada, você deve aumentar o número máximo de jogadores.

Key.Original: You need to select a person to kick!
Key.English: You need to select a person to kick!
Key.German: Du musst einen Spieler auswählen, um ihn kicken zu können!
Key.French: Vous devez choisir une personne pour le kick!
Key.Italian: Devi selezionare una persona da espellere!
Key.Portuguese: Você tem que selecionar um jogador para kickar!

Key.Original: You cannot leave the gang without appointing a new leader first!
Key.English: You cannot leave the gang without appointing a new leader first
Key.German: Du kannst die Gang nicht verlassen, ohne einen neuen Anführer zu ernennen!
Key.French: Vous ne pouvez pas quitter le gang sans la nomination d'un nouveau chef d'abord!
Key.Italian: Non puoi abbandonare la Gang prima di aver selezionato un nuovo Capo!
Key.Portuguese: Você não pode sair da gangue sem transferir a liderança antes!

Key.Original:
You are about to transfer leadership over to %1
By transferring leadership you will no longer be in control of the gang unless ownership is transferred back.
Key.English:
You are about to transfer leadership over to %1
By transferring leadership you will no longer be in control of the gang unless ownership is transferred back.
Key.German:
Du bist dabei, die Führung an %1 zu übertragen
Durch die Übertragung der Leitung der Gang hast du keine Kontrolle mehr.
Key.French:
Vous allez transférer le commandement à %1
En transférant le commandement, vous ne serez plus le chef du gang, sauf si le commandement est transféré de nouveau.
Key.Italian:
Stai per traferire il comando a %1
Facendolo non avrai più il controllo della Gang fino a quando non ti verrà restituito il comando.
Key.Portuguese:
Você vai transferir a liderança da gangue para %1
Você não será mais o lider da gangue.

Key.Original: You need to select a person first!
Key.English: You need to select a person first!
Key.German: Du musst erst eine Person auswählen!
Key.French: Vous devez choisir une personne d'abord!
Key.Portuguese: Você tem que selecionar um jogador antes!

Key.Original: You are about to upgrade the maximum members allowed for your gang.
Key.English: You are about to upgrade the maximum members allowed for your gang.
Key.German: Du bist dabei, die maximale Anzahl an Mitgliedern zu erhöhen.
Key.French: Vous êtes sur le point de mettre à niveau la limite de membre autorisées pour votre gang.
Key.Italian: Stai aumentando il numero massimo di membri consentiti all'interno della tua Gang
Key.Portuguese: Você vai atualizar o limite de membros da gangue.

Key.Original: You do not have enough money in your bank account to upgrade the gangs maximum member limit.
Key.English: You do not have enough money in your bank account to upgrade the gangs maximum member limit.
Key.German: Du hast nicht genug Geld auf deinem Bankkonto, um das Mitgliederlimit deiner Gang zu erhöhen.
Key.French: Vous n'avez pas assez d'argent dans votre compte de banque pour mettre à niveau la limite de membre maximale.
Key.Italian: Non hai abbastanza fondi nel tuo conto in banca per aumentare il limite massimo di membri.
Key.Portuguese: Você não dinheiro suficiente para para aumentar o limite da gangue.

Key.Original: You have upgraded from %1 to %2 maximum slots for <t color='#8cff9b'>$%3</t>
Key.English: You have upgraded from %1 to %2 maximum slots for <t color='#8cff9b'>$%3</t>
Key.German: Du hast für <t color='#8cff9b'>$%3</t> von %1 auf %2 Plätze erhöht
Key.French: Vous avez mis à niveau à partir de %1 à %2 membres maximum for <t color='#8cff9b'>$%3</t>
Key.Italian: Hai aumentato i posti massimi da %1 a %2 per <t color='#8cff9b'>€%3</t>
Key.Portuguese: Limite de membros atualizado de %1 para %2 por <t color='#8cff9b'>R$%3</t>

Key.Original: Du hast nicht genügend Geld. Benötigtes Geld $%1
Sorry dein %1 wurde als zerstört gemeldet und daher zum Schrottplatz gebracht.
Das Fahrzeug %1 ist bereits aktiv und kann daher nicht ausgeparkt werden.
Es befindet sich bereits ein Fahrzeug am Spawnpunkt. Deine Kosten wurden erstattet.
Du hast dein Farzeug für $%1 verkauft!
Gemietete Fahrzeuge können nicht in der Garage geparkt werden.
Das Fahrzeug gehört dir nicht. Es kann nicht eingeparkt werden.
Du besitzt nicht die erforderlichen $%1 für %2
Du musst diese Lieferung zu %1 bringen
Du konntest die Lieferung nicht abschließen, da du gestorben bist!
Du benötigst $%1 um geheilt zu werden
Du darfst dich nicht weiter als 5m vom Doktor entfernen
%1 dein %2 wird gerade von der Polizei beschlagnahmt.
Du hast %1 beschlagnahmt\n\nDadurch hast du $%2 erhalten.
You are not near a resource field
Du kannst dein Fahrzeug nicht bewegen, während du abbaust
Abbau abgeschlossen. Das Fahrzeug baute %1 ab
Der Bankraub ist aus unbekannten Gründen fehlgeschlagen
Dieser Safe wird bereis durch jemand anderen geknackt!
Der Safe wurde erst vor kurzem geknackt
Dieses Haus kannst du nicht kaufen!
Das Haus gehört bereits jemand anderem!
%1 has revived you and a fee of $%2 was taken from your bank account for their services.
Key.English: %1 has revived you and a fee of $%2 was taken from your bank account for their services.
Key.German: %1 hat dich wiederbelebt und eine Gebühr von $2% wurde von deinem Bankkonto für die Dienste abgehoben.
Key.French: %1 vous à réanimé, les fraits de $%2 sont transféré depuit votre compte bancaire pour leurs services.
Key.Italian: %1 ti ha rianimato e sono stati prelevati €%2 dal tuo conto in banca per pagare la prestazione.

Key.Original: Someone else is already reviving this person
Key.English: Someone else is already reviving this person
Key.German: Jemand anderes belebt diese Person bereits wieder
Key.French: Quelqu'un d'autre s'occupe déjà de cette personne
Key.Italian: Qualcun'altro sta già provando a rianimare questa persona

Key.Original: This person either respawned or was already revived.
Key.English: This person either respawned or was already revived.
Key.German: Diese Person ist entweder respawnt oder wurde bereits wiederbelebt.
Key.French: Cette personne à soit réapparue, soit a déjà été réanimée.
Key.Italian: Questa persona è stata già rianimata o ha fatto respawn.

Key.Original: You got to far away from the body.
Key.English: You got to far away from the body.
Key.German: Du bist zu weit weg vom Körper
Key.French: Vous êtes trop loin du corps.
Key.Italian: Sei andato troppo distante dal corpo.

Key.Original: You have revived %1 and received $%2 for your services.
Key.English: You have revived %1 and received $%2 for your services.
Key.German: Du hast %1 wiederbelebt und bekamst $%2 für deine Dienste.
Key.French: Vous avez réanimé %1 vous avez reçu $%2 pour votre aide
Key.Italian: Hai rianimato %1 e hai ricevuto €%2 per la tua prestazione.
